Greetings! Hello! This is DHIREN here. How are you? I Have found your profile from Naukri. One of Our Client  CMMi level technology company is urgently looking out for  Technical Lead (DWH, ETL ) with 9 to 12 yrs. Exp for FT Position at Mumbai /Kolkatta Office who can start immediately.     Position :  Technical Lead CL4 (DWH, ETL) Work Experience: 9 to 12 Years Number of positions:  4 Mandatory Skill : Dataware Housing, ETL Employment Type:  Permanent Budget : Based on Years of Exp & Current Salary  Notice Period: Immediate Joiner Work Mode: Work From Office Interview Process: Screening > L1 > L2 > PM > HR. Work Location: Mumbai/Kolkata Must-Have Skills/Competencies: SKILLS:  Dataware Housing, ETL , Cloud Data Engineer, Python , Advanced SQL , Data Pipelines, Data Wrangling, Object-Oriented Programming, Cloud Storage, Source Control (git)     Job Details: Sr Cloud Data Engineer  will design future-state, modern data architecture for transformation at the enterprise level using advanced cloud architectural principles. Using tools such as, they will also work with cutting-edge DevOps technologies, develop advanced analytics products, and apply data and statistical programming tools to enterprise data to advance and enable key mission outcomes within cloud environments (GCP, AWS, Azure).   Job Overview : As a senior member of the team, deliver production data pipelines while working in collaboration with product and application teams.  ??   Mentor data engineering talent  ??   Collaborate as part of a cross-functional Agile team to create and enhance software that enables state-of-the-art, next-generation big data and machine learning applications  ??   Leverage cloud-based architectures and technologies to move, transform, and secure data at scale  ??   Advocate for data engineering and software best practices Responsibilities: Data Management and Maintenance : Ensure data accuracy, completeness, and      consistency in databases and other storage ( S3 ) systems. This      includes data cleaning, backup, recovery, and performance optimization. Technical Support and Troubleshooting : Data Support Engineers      provide technical support to customers or internal teams. They      troubleshoot data-related issues, identify root causes, and implement      solutions to resolve problems. This often includes working with databases,      data processing systems, and  data analytics  tools. System Integration and Development : Integrating new systems      and technologies into the existing data infrastructure. This could involve      working closely with other IT professionals to ensure compatibility and      efficiency. Data Analysis and Reporting : Assisting in data analysis and      preparing reports. This might require proficiency in specific data      analytics and reporting tools and software. Collaboration with Cross-Functional Teams : Data Support Engineers      often work closely with other departments, such as development,      operations, and data science teams, to support data-related aspects of      projects. They assist in integrating new technologies and systems that      involve data processing and management. Compliance and Security : Ensuring data handling and storage comply with legal and      regulatory requirements. This includes  managing permissions, monitoring      data (IAM)  access, and safeguarding against data breaches. Continuous Learning and Improvement : Keeping up to date with      the latest technologies and best data management and support practices.      This often involves continuous learning and possibly certification in      relevant areas. Problem Solving : Identifying and resolving data-related problems, ranging from      minor glitches to significant system-wide issues requiring in-depth      technical knowledge. Documentation and Reporting : Creating and maintaining documentation      related to data systems, processes, and solutions is an important part of      their role. They may also be involved in creating reports on data issues      and resolutions.  Data Analysis Tools : Familiarity with data      analysis tools and software, such as Excel, Tableau, or more advanced      tools like R or Python for data manipulation and analysis. (Nice  to      have) Programming Languages : Proficient in scripting languages like  Python, Node JS,      JavaScript Networking and System Administration:  Basic understanding of      networking concepts and system administration, as data support often      involves working with networked data systems. Data Nodes, cloud scales      (h-Scale and V-Scales) Data Security : Knowledge of data security principles and practices to ensure the      integrity and confidentiality of data. Data Security, Data Encryption      (Data In-Transit and Data in Rest)  Data visualization/Report Tools : Power BI/Tableau/ Looker will be an      added advantage. Analytical Skills: Data Interpretation : Ability to interpret and analyze data to identify trends,      anomalies, and critical insights. Attention to Detail : Precision and attention to detail are crucial for managing and      analyzing large datasets. Problem-solving : Strong problem-solving skills to diagnose issues and develop      practical solutions. Must-Have Skills/Competencies : Professional services experience, a strong plus Cloud provider certification  is a strong plus. Python Advanced SQL Cloud-native data stores (Redshift, Athena, Big Query, Synapse, Snowflake) Cloud Storage(S3, GCS, Azure Blob Storage) Modern warehousing and data lake patterns Airflow Or other orchestration tools Cloud Technologies (One or More of AWS, Azure, GCP): Security/networking      basics Cloud-native tools for batch and streaming data processing Cloud native query engines Serverless cloud functions, a plus Visualization/reporting      experience, a plus Nice to Have Skills/Competencies: 5+ years  in building, scaling, and      optimizing  data pipelines . 3+ years  of experience  developing      and deploying solutions  in one or more of the  public clouds - AWS,      Azure, GCP 5+ years  of professional experience      in  data wrangling  in relational databases using SQL. 5+ years  experience with  object-oriented      programming  design best practices 5+ years  of experience using  source      control (git) Experience promoting data      pipeline through development, testing, and production environments. A bachelors degree in      computer science, Information Technology, or a related field is often      required. Certifications for database      management, data analysis, or specific technologies relevant to the role      can enhance a candidate's qualifications. Soft Skills:  Communication : Excellent verbal and written communication skills to explain      technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders and work collaboratively      with team members. Customer Service : Ability to provide high-quality customer service, including      patience and a positive attitude when dealing with user issues. Should be able to monitor, troubleshoot, and maintain data       pipelines to ensure that data is transferred smoothly. Should be able to monitor, troubleshoot, and maintain the ETL       processes to make sure the aggregated data sets are generated timely in       the Redshift DW and data quality is maintained. Time Management : Managing time effectively, especially when dealing with multiple      issues or projects simultaneously. Teamwork : Ability to work effectively in a team environment, contributing      to collaborative problem-solving. Adaptability : Adapting to new technologies and changes in the IT landscape, as      data support roles, often involve continual learning and adaptation Moving further, Pls provide below details along with your most updated resume so can initiate interview process. # Full Name (As per passport) : # Contact No: # Email Address: # Education: # Overall Years of work Exp.in IT :    # Years of Exp. in  Dataware Housing: # Years of Exp. in  ETL: # Years of Exp. in  Cloud Data : # Years of Exp. in  Data Pipelines: # Years of Exp. in  Python: # Years of Exp. in  Advanced SQL: # Years of Exp. in  Object-Oriented Programming: # Years of Exp. in  Cloud Storage:   # Years of Exp. in  Source Control (git): # Are You Working currently: YES/NO # IF Yes Name of the company:                                          # Currently Residing at : # Preferred work Location: Mumbai Or Kolkatta: # Current Salary:    # Expected Salary :  # Notice Period (If Any) :   # Are you Serving Notice Period: YES/NO # If YES then what is your LWD: # Are you having any other Offer in hand? (If Yes, Specify): # Reason for looking a new job: # Start Date if gets selected:  Qualifications:  BE or Equivalent CSE/IT  Highly motivated with excellent verbal and written communication, presentation, facilitation, negotiation and problem-solving skills  Self-starter with strong organizational and time management skills, self-directed Regards with thanks, Dhiren Adani Global Recruiter/ Consultant / Director  "HOPES FOREVER CONSULTANCY PVT. LTD."  Andheri(West) Mumbai-400053 Maharashtra-India  Mob: +91-98208 05225 (India) dhiren@hopesforever.com www.hopesforever.com

column1: Technical Project Manager with Web, EDW, BI and desktop application
column2: Role & responsibilities     Position: Project Manager Experience: 10+ yrs Job   Responsibilities:  Hands on attitude when mentoring/ helping  other team members  Exposure to software development especially  Web, EDW, BI   and   desktop application   Design   software   high level as well as detailed design   Interact   with   customers,   gather   requirements  and take over as a Scrum Master  Take on all challenges of productization and project management; lead the dev team with example  Responsible for d elivery   deadlines  Responsible for estimating new proposals  Identify project risks proactively and define mitigation plan   Suggests smart technical solutions to meet client requirements efficiently  Consistently delivers high-quality services to our clients  Defining and tracking project timeline  Champion a responsive and stack-agnostic approach to modern software development.  Should be proficient in Agile methodologies. Essential Skill Sets:  Should have hands on experience in  web   technologies   or   mobile   application  Should have knowledge of nodejs,Rect,angular,,net core, RESTful and SOAP web services.   Should have knowledge of RDBMS, SQL, NoSQL, concurrency, security, encryption, HTTPS etc.  Should be comfortable with  multiple   technology   stacks   on   both   front-end   and   back-end.  Very strong analytical skills and problem solving ability.  Very good oral and written communication skills.  Knowledge on cloud services.  Experience on monitoring servers will be an added advantage. Preferred candidate profile   Should have following professional qualities: Leadership Achieves excellence in all areas of business. Champions change and effectively manage the implementation of new ideas. Teamwork Reinforces team approach throughout development efforts. Supports and solicits input from team members. Client Management Communicates effectively with clients to identify needs and evaluate alternative technical solutions and strategies. Continually defines ways to increase customer satisfaction and deepen client relationships. Maintains lasting client relationships. Ensures that we consistently deliver superior technical solutions to clients. Desirable Skill Set: UML knowledge to convey design and also to model requirements Knowledge of a wide range of technology stacks on both front-end and back-end. Knowledge of Logistic / LTL domain Immediate to 1 Month Joiners Preferred Job Location : Mumbai Perks and benefits

column1: Supply Chain Systems - TMS Solution Specialist
column2: Supply Chain Systems TMS Specialist will be working with different internal cross functional business teams in NEXTracker Supply Chain and Our Business Systems Implementation Partner      As a Certified OTM (Oracle Transportation Management) functional consultant at Nextracker, you will work as an inhouse expert of Oracle TMS for Implementation and Support for different Supply Chain/Logistics Processes      You will play a critical role in developing / configuring OTM solutions to NX process needs      OTM functional consultant will work with OTM Implementation Team and deliver solutions for the Global team at Nextracker      In Addition, the OTM functional consultant will also be responsible for Business L1 support of the solution in Steady State      You will be part of the Supply Chain Business Systems COE team which is responsible for driving the Supply Chain systems Digital Transformation program                    You would love this job if      :        You love to work in a hyper-growth environment that s powered by bright, kind and people motivated by challenge.      You love to help build global scalable disruptive Supply Chain System solutions.      You find value in creating a models/solution that empower business stakeholders with insights to make day to day decisions.      When presented with complex models you are able to understand all the individual parts involved      Explore multiple methods for developing a solution and objectively determine the best approach      Due to the nature of the role and reporting visibility you are very attentive to detail and presentation      You have the ability to partner and build trust with different teams across the company            Here is a glimpse of what you ll do:      Key Roles and Responsibilities -              The Oracle SCM Functional Consultant will have an overall responsibility for the implementation process handling and the related documentation of the project deployment on Nextracker side      The role s focus is to participate in the functional phases of software support and development in relation to Oracle ERP/Cloud extensions, Interfaces, User Interfaces, Integrations and Reports related to Key Business KPI s              Active participation in the project initiatives and functional enhancements. Create and manage Oracle Service Requests, prepare the documents in accordance of Nextracker s development life cycles and change control processes.      Work / Coordinate with offshore and onsite team members of Nextracker Business as well as Oracle Implementation Partner      Gather, analyze business requirements & perform FIT-GAP analysis      Understand business requirements and explain to Implementation team in a simplified way, also require some technical knowledge to be able to write functional document for RICE which could be understood by technical consultants      Active participation in preparing various project documents - Solution design, Functional Specifications, Configuration Documents, SIT-UAT Test Scripts, Training materials etc.      Explain the business requirement to other team members in the project as needed      Write functional requirement documents and if required work on configuration of different screens, functionalities, and UI s reports as per business requirements      Work with implementation team to ensure the sprint / Conference Room Pilot is delivered as per business needs      Create and execute test scenarios in various test environments. Work closely with users during user acceptance testing phase      This role is also required to support of Oracle SCM models and their data interaction with other modules as needed.                Here is some of what you ll need (required      ):        Functional Certification for Oracle Transportation Management      At least 3 years of OTM (Oracle Transportation Management) experience with minimum 1 year of implementation project work.      3+ years of Supply Chain Systems experience with a Bachelor s degree or higher      3+ years of      consulting/implementation/end      user experience with any of the widely used Logistics Transportation Management platforms such as Oracle, Blue Yonder etc.      Prior Domain experience in Logistics Industry is preferred      Expert skills of Excel spreadsheet modeling, macros, pivot tables, formulas, charts etc.                Other Generic requirements -            Knowledge of Excel spreadsheet modeling, macros, pivot tables, formulas, charts etc.      Ability to translate Business Requirements into system solutions.      Strong understanding of data integration      Knowledge / Understanding of any ERP (NetSuite preferred) and how to integrate with other application      Must possess business acumen, strong analytical, troubleshooting, problem-solving, and project management skills      Knowledge / Experience in Agile Project Management is an added advantage      Excellent communication and interpersonal skills      Proficiency in Microsoft Office      Team player with strong organizational skills.
column11: Supply chain, ERP, Test scripts, Consulting, OTM, Oracle, Troubleshooting, Macros, Monitoring, Logistics
